name: shsp
description: A protocol with only an handshake
author: Luca Gualandi

scripts.barrelsby: npx lage barrelsby && npm run add-js
scripts.compile: npm run barrelsby && npm run build && npm run gen-exports && npm run add-js
scripts.test:stun-handler: npm run prepareTest && npm run test:stun-handler --workspace=@shsp/tests
scripts.test:shsp-socket: npm run prepareTest && npm run test:shsp-socket --workspace=@shsp/tests
scripts.test:receiver: npm run prepareTest && npm run test:receiver --workspace=@shsp/tests
scripts.test:sender: npm run prepareTest && npm run test:sender --workspace=@shsp/tests
scripts.test:receiver-global: npm run prepareTest && npm run test:receiver-global --workspace=@shsp/tests
scripts.test:sender-global: npm run prepareTest && npm run test:sender-global --workspace=@shsp/tests
